author: The Plain Bagel
description:
00:00 - Introduction
02:12 - Why Economists Disagree
04:06 - Where’s the inflation? 
08:12 - Are Tariffs Deflationary?
10:00 - What About Manufacturing?
11:32 - New Investments in the US
15:06 - Why is GDP Growing?

Despite economists warning on the negative impact of tariffs, the US has been reporting stronger-than-expected GDP growth, record tariff revenue, and trillions of inbound investment commitments. Let's dive into whether tariffs are actually improving the US economy.

If you'd like to support the channel, you can do so at https://www.patreon.com/c/ThePlainBagel :)

DISCLAIMER:

Richard is not responsible for investment actions taken by viewers
title: Are Trump's Tariffs Working?
